author: Simon Difford
description: Slightly on the sweet side and very fruity. If you like this, you'll love a French Martini or a Very French Martini.
name: Sunset (Coconut Rum) 'Martini'
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
Finish by pouring grenadine into the centre of the cocktail (which will sink to form sunset affect)
